item.title: Game crash when turning on the torchlight
item.dc:creator: nicos
item.description:
Hello,

I think I found a workaround: when I switch the shadow details from high to medium, I can turn the flashlight on and everything is fine. But then if I switch it to high again, I can turn it on and there is no crash but there’s no light visible, it’s useless. And if I quit the game and restart it, then the behavior I described above is happening again.
